characters.name: Sensei
characters.description:
~!He is a cursed being who was a doctor in the past.
He found Shiva and took care of her while hiding from her that she was abandoned.
He has a good heart and does everything for his little protégé, not hesitating to risk his life.!~

characters.name: Shiva
characters.description:
~!She is a little girl who does not seem to be touched by the curse.
She was picked up by sensei, but unaware that she was abandoned, she believes that her auntie will come back one day to look for her and she looks forward to her return.
She is a naive child; sweet and innocent, she is not aware of the danger that surrounds her.!~
